"Equipping Weapons":
"You can equip a weapon by selecting \"Equipment/Palette\" on the Main Menu, then selecting \"Equip Weapon\" and choosing the weapon you want to equip from the list.

If you want to remove your weapon, press the \"Remove\" button at the bottom of the list."

"Weapons fall into one of three categories: Striking, Shooting and Tech. You can tell which category a weapon falls into by the color of its icon:

: Striking
: Shooting
: Tech"
